snippet.title: The King Is Watching – Announcement Trailer | tinyBuild Connect 2024
snippet.description:
Play the Demo on Steam now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2753900/The_King_is_Watching/ 

The King is Watching is a roguelite kingdom builder. But there's a twist - your lazy peasants only work when you're watching. Keep a watchful eye on them, or everything stops. Strategically place buildings and your gaze to balance resources gathering, production, and army training. 
Save your kingdom: overcome a series of ever-challenging invasion armies over a grand journey to save your people. Infinite replayability is granted by a great amount of approaches you can take to succeed.
